amendment.description: Amendment to prohibit earmarking of funds appropriated under the Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 111-340 to prohibit earmarking of funds appropriated under the Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 371 - 63 (Roll no. 900).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mr. Flake.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A003) Agreed to by recorded vote: 371 - 63 (Roll no. 900).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
